attributes.background: Fires are raging at a record rate in Brazil's Amazon rainforest, 73,000 fires have been recorded in the Amazon rainforest already this year. If we don’t act now, it will reach a point where the effects will become irreversible. We need to start acting against climate change now not in the future.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/266638
